name: ClockWorks
description:
OBJECTIVE: Find the flag and bring it to the gnome at the top of the map to win.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move 

SPACEBAR to jump 

E to reverse time

 R to reset

Entire game including, models, textures, and code built from scratch during Mini JameGam #14

Programming, Level Design: Asbert Sardina

Models: Carter Goodmanson

Texturing: Logan Goodmanson
